title: (x) Peter K. Scaturro - ITC Berkeley Oldstyle {Mark S}
content:
WANDA01,   
   
The quality of that scan is so poor, I doubt we can see any details of the letters other than basic shape. Any chance of getting a larger, or sharper image?
author: bowfinpw

comments.content: It looks like Berkeley Oldstyle [Bold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142707/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-berkeley-old-style/itc-berkeley-oldstyle-bold-italic/testdrive.html?s=A%a0message%a0from&p=24) and [Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142707/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-berkeley-old-style/itc-berkeley-oldstyle-bold/testdrive.html?s=P%a0E%a0T%a0E%a0R%a0%a0%a0K%a0.%a0%a0%a0S%a0C%a0A%a0T%a0U%a0R%a0R%a0O&p=24) to me.
